content.raw: According to the simspark server, the agents should be able to choose what kind of robot type they want. Therefore, before they send the init message, they should send a "(scene <filename>)" message that tells us which robot to use. I remember that is another rule that no more than 3 robots of the same type can be loaded. We should also enforce this through the server.
